readable.title: 732468337_a37075225e
readable.content: A naked baby and toddler are playing with red fingerpaints . A naked baby and toddler on the floor covered in paint , the toddler putting her hands on the baby 's head . A naked baby and toddler smear each other in paint . A naked toddler is covering a naked baby with paint . Two naked young children smear each other with red paint .
